price: (10) And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
